# Function for intensity

Function \texttt{g.m()} 

1. calculate $\exp\{\exp(\theta_3)(\mathbf{m}_h - M_0)\}$ 
2. $\mathbf m_h$ vector of past magnitudes
3. $M_0$ magnitude of completeness

Function \texttt{g.t()} 

1. calculate $1/(t - \mathbf{t}_h + \exp\theta_4)^{\exp(\theta_5) + 1}$
2. $t$ time of evaluation (single value)
3. $\mathbf t_h$ vector of past magnitudes 


Function \texttt{g.s()}

1. calculate $(1/2\pi|\Sigma|)\exp\{(\mathbf s - \mathbf s_{h,i})^t \Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf s - \mathbf s_{h,i})\}$ 
2. $\mathbf s$ location of evaluation (single location)
3. $\{s_{h,i}, i = 1,...,N\}$ past locations (multiple)
